data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fend, Steven V., Liu, Yingkui, Steinmann, David, Giere, Olav, Barton, Hazel A., Luiszer, Fred, Erséus, Christer (2016): Limnodrilus sulphurensis n. sp., from a sulfur cave in Colorado, USA, with notes on the morphologically similar L. profundicola (Clitellata, Naididae, Tubificinae). Zootaxa 4066 (4): 451-468, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4066.4.6
